questions.question: What is traditionally hidden inside a Christmas pudding?
Which country started the tradition of putting up a Christmas tree?
What are the two other names for Santa Claus?
choices: Pere Noel and Old Man Winter

questions.question: In the song 'Frosty the Snowman,' what made Frosty come to life?
What popular Christmas song was actually written for Thanksgiving?
choices: Santa Claus is Coming to Town

questions.question: In the song 'Twelve Days of Christmas,' what is given on the 7th day?
Who is the author of 'A Christmas Carol'?
What are the two other most popular names for Santa Claus?
What popular Christmas beverage is also called 'milk punch'?
What did the other reindeer not let Rudolph do because of his shiny red nose?
Which Christmas song contains the lyric 'Everyone dancing merrily in the new old-fashioned way'?
In which modern-day country was Saint Nicholas born?
What Christmas-themed ballet premiered in Saint Petersburg, Russia in 1892?
What is the main color of the Grinch, who is known for stealing Christmas?
What Christmas decoration was originally made from strands of silver?
Which country is credited with the creation of the Christmas beverage, Eggnog?
What would you be likely to find under the 'Upside-Down Christmas Tree'?
Which Christmas song's second verse starts with 'O tidings of comfort and joy'?
In the movie 'Elf', what was the first rule of The Code of Elves?
choices: There's room for everyone on the nice list
The best way to spread Christmas cheer is singing loud for all to hear

questions.question: What figure from English folklore is associated with Santa Claus?
What is the name of the red-nosed reindeer?
Which real-life person is Santa Claus based on?
In Charles Dickens' 'A Christmas Carol', what was the first name of Scrooge?
What popular holiday plant is known to be an aphrodisiac?

resultCategories.title: Grinch Alert
resultCategories.description: It seems you're starting from a Scrooge-like perspective with a 0% score! But remember, even the Grinch found his Christmas spirit eventually.
resultCategories.suggestion: Begin your transformation into a festive fan by watching 'How the Grinch Stole Christmas!' or reading up on the holiday's most heartwarming stories. There's a whole world of Christmas joy to discover, and it's never too late to start!
resultCategories.alt: A character resembling the Grinch in a Santa suit, standing with hands on hips in a room with minimalist Christmas decorations. The room has a rustic look with wooden floors and furniture.

resultCategories.title: Festive Beginner
resultCategories.description: You're at the start of your festive journey with a basic understanding of yuletide joy. There's so much more to explore and enjoy.
resultCategories.suggestion: Why not try baking some traditional Christmas cookies? It's a fun, delicious way to learn about festive foods and customs.
resultCategories.alt: A close-up of a wooden countertop with freshly baked Christmas cookies and a rolling pin. Pinecones and a jar of icing sugar accompany the scene, suggesting a cozy holiday baking setting.

resultCategories.title: Holiday Explorer
resultCategories.description: With a score of 40% or under, you're getting into the swing of things. You have a good understanding of some Christmas cheer but are ready to unwrap even more.
resultCategories.suggestion: Attend a local Christmas market or festival to immerse yourself in the season's traditions and pick up some holiday trivia.
resultCategories.alt: A festive Christmas market at night, bustling with holiday decorations and lights. Wooden stalls are adorned with garlands and lights, selling various Christmas items. In the foreground, a snowman figure stands next to a decorated tree.

resultCategories.title: Seasoned Celebrator
resultCategories.description: Scoring 60% or under shows that you have a hearty dose of Christmas knowledge and spirit. You're well on your way to becoming a festive aficionado.
resultCategories.suggestion: Host a Christmas carol karaoke night with friends or family to test your knowledge of Christmas music and spread the cheer.
resultCategories.alt: A group of seven friends in cozy winter clothing enjoying a Christmas gathering in a living room. They are laughing and toasting drinks, with a beautifully decorated Christmas tree and lit candles creating a warm ambiance.

resultCategories.title: Festive Enthusiast
resultCategories.description: You're nearly at the top of the nice list with a score of 80% or under! Your Christmas spirit is shining bright.
resultCategories.suggestion: Volunteer for a holiday community event or organize a festive fundraiser. Sharing the joy of the season is a great way to celebrate your high score.
resultCategories.alt: A close-up of hands holding a heart-shaped Christmas tree ornament against a backdrop of a lit Christmas tree and warm lights, conveying a sense of warmth and holiday spirit.

resultCategories.title: Christmas Champion
resultCategories.description: Congratulations, you could out-Christmas Santa himself with a perfect 100%! Your knowledge and love for the holiday are truly unparalleled.
resultCategories.suggestion: Share your love for the season by teaching others. Perhaps you could lead a workshop on Christmas history or write a blog sharing your favorite festive facts and stories. Your enthusiasm is contagious, so spread it far and wide!
resultCategories.alt: A cheerful Santa Claus standing outdoors with arms wide open, surrounded by gifts and a snowy landscape. It's nighttime, and snowflakes are falling, while a lit Christmas tree and houses in the background complete the festive scene.
